author: janhoy
msg: SOLR-2598: exampledocs/books.json should use name instead of title

author: markt
msg: Avoid known bottleneck in JVM when converting between Strings and bytes by always providing a Charset rather than an encoding name.
Based on a patch by Dave Engberg.
Note: There are some Charsets that the JVM must support and in those cases Charset.forName(String) should not throw an exception.

msg: used the object adapter pattern to implement the ShortestDistance in order to expose more intuitive APIs
